statements: DELETE FROM spa_reservation WHERE customer_id = 100 AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM spa_reservation WHERE preference_1 IS NULL OR preference_2 = 'Massage';
DELETE FROM spa_appointments WHERE appointment_id = 12345 AND therapist_id = 6789;
DELETE FROM spa_reservations WHERE customer_id = 123 AND appointment_date = '2022-06-15';
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE favorite_therapist = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM spa_reservations WHERE appointment_date < '2023-01-01' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age < 25);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 60 AND membership_status = false;
DELETE FROM services WHERE price > 1000 AND category = 'Luxury';
DELETE FROM spa_preferences WHERE customer_id = 2 AND service_id = 1;
DELETE FROM spa_appointments WHERE customer_id = 1 AND appointment_date = '2022-01-15';
